definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt/fig. life's daily necessities
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.
Piotr Ilyich Tchaikowsky (1840-1893), Russian composer, composer of 6 symphonies and the opera Eugene Onegin

sentences.english: The second chapter introduces the overview of the Sibeichai to conduct a comprehensive introduction.
sentences.chinese: 第二章介绍寺北柴的概况，对该村进行全面的介绍。

sentences.english: Every man looks at his wood-pile with a kind of affection.
sentences.chinese: 每一个人看见了他的柴火堆都非常欢喜。

sentences.english: Utilizing genetic engineering to improve heredity of Hedysarum mongolicum has become an important practice meanings.
sentences.chinese: 利用基因工程对羊柴进行遗传改良具有重要实践意义。

sentences.english: He stoked up the fire in the hearth.
sentences.chinese: 他给壁炉里的火添了点柴。

sentences.english: Now we visit the apartment of the Rogarshevsky family ofthe Lithuania.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们来到罗格柴夫斯基一家的公寓。

sentences.english: He groped for an armful of wood and hastened back into the room.
sentences.chinese: 他摸索着抱了一捧柴，匆匆回到屋里。

sentences.english: Young men toil at the millstones, boys stagger under heavy loads.
sentences.chinese: 青年人应该服役推磨，幼童倒在柴捆之下。

sentences.english: He placed the chopped wood orderly on the woodstack.
sentences.chinese: 劈好的干柴整齐地码在柴垛上。

sentences.english: Millet made a portrait of Lady Chesterfield, which flattered her.
sentences.chinese: 米勒为了逢迎柴斯特菲尔德夫人而替她画了一幅像。

sentences.english: He tied the sticks with cords.
In the garden again Alice saw the Cheshire cat.
sentences.chinese: 在花园里爱丽丝又一次见到了柴郡猫。

sentences.english: Sold into money can buy a donkey, then along home door-to-door selling wood.
sentences.chinese: 卖到钱就可以买驴，再沿家挨户卖柴。

sentences.english: The Yule Log is a tradition that dates back hundreds of years.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞柴这一传统有几百年的历史。

sentences.english: Chai tea in the United States is made of black tea leaves and spices steeped in milk.
sentences.chinese: 柴在美国茶是红茶牛奶中浸泡的叶子和香料。

sentences.english: Chai Tianshun was appointed Deputy Director-General of the Quality and Technological Supervision of Henan Province.
sentences.chinese: 任命柴天顺为河南省质量技术监督局副局长。

sentences.english: She threw more wood into the stove and soon the fire was roaring.
sentences.chinese: 她又在炉子里添了些柴，火很快就呼呼地烧起来。

definition: high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
refers to various monocotyledonous flowering plants including Acorus calamus and Typha orientalis/common cattail/bullrush
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
